title: Pilot
description: 97 years after a nuclear war, human kind is living in space. 100 juvenile delinquents are sent down to Earth to see if the planet is habitable.

title: Earth Skills
description: Discovering that Jasper may still be alive, Clarke, Bellamy, Finn, Wells and Murphy head out to find him. On the Ark, Abby is determined to prove Earth is habitable, and enlists a mechanic to craft an escape pod.

title: Earth Kills
description: As a dangerous, acidic fog approaches, Clarke, Finn and Wells set out in search of a seaweed-like plant to make an antibiotic poultice for Jasper's wounds, while a vulnerable young girl follows when Bellamy takes a group out hunting for food.

title: Murphy's Law
description: Bellamy, Clarke and Finn try to protect Charlotte when everyone learns she killed Wells. On the Ark, Abby risks getting floated in order to give Raven the chance to launch the escape pod.

title: Twilight's Last Gleaming
description: A plan to contact the Ark is put in motion after Raven crash lands on Earth. Meanwhile, Abby exposes Kane's plan to reduce the population of the Ark.

title: His Sister's Keeper
description: Bellamy, Finn and Jasper head into Grounder territory to search for Octavia, as flashbacks show the siblings' difficult childhood on the Ark. Meanwhile, Raven finds out about Clarke and Finn.

title: Contents Under Pressure
description: While Bellamy tortures the Grounder, Raven and Clarke make contact with the Ark and ask Abby to help them save Finn. On the Ark, Kane deals with his guilt, and Jaha surprises the council with a shocking revelation.

title: Day Trip
description: Shumway secretly orders one of the 100 to kill Bellamy. Meanwhile, hallucinogenic nuts provide Octavia with an opportunity to help the Grounder escape the camp, and Bellamy and Clarke investigate a nearby underground depot, where they find military weapons.

title: Unity Day
description: Finn arranges a meeting with Clarke and the leader of the Grounders in order to bring peace, however a sceptical Clarke warns Bellamy, who along with Jasper and Raven follow them to the meeting with weapons. On the Ark, Diana takes over the exodus ship.

title: I Am Become Death
description: Murphy returns to the camp carrying a horrific virus created by the Grounders to weaken the camp. After learning the Grounders plan to attack the next day, Bellamy, Finn and Raven come up with a plan to delay them.

title: The Calm
description: Clarke and Finn are captured by Anya, who forces them to save the life of a victim of the explosion. Meanwhile, Raven deals with her split from Finn, and Kane fights to save the Ark and it's survivors.

title: We Are Grounders: Part 1
description: Clarke and Finn come face to face with a new enemy after Lincoln rescues them from Anya, while Bellamy, Raven, Octavia and Jasper deal with a vengeful Murphy. On the Ark, Jaha makes a plan to try and get to Earth.

title: We Are Grounders: Part 2
description: As the remaining members of the 100 face off against the Grounders, Jaha makes a noble sacrifice to ensure the Ark makes it to Earth.

title: The 48
description: While Clarke struggles to make sense of her bizarre surroundings, Lincoln risks his life to save Octavia, and Kane establishes his authority.

title: Inclement Weather
description: Clarke demands answers from President Wallace, Abby performs emergency surgery on Raven, and Octavia resorts to violence to find Lincoln.

title: Reapercussions
description: Clarke and Anya join forces to escape Mount Weather. Kane issues an order to have Abby brutally punished. Octavia searches for Lincoln.

title: Many Happy Returns
description: Clarke choose betrayal. Meanwhile, Bellamy, Finn, Murphy, Sterling and Monroe race against time to save a survivor of the Ark crash, and Raven struggles to cope with her paralysis.

title: Human Trials
description: While Kane leads a mission to make peace with the Grounders, Jasper agrees to participate in a risky experiment, and Finn's search for Clarke takes a violent turn.

title: Fog of War
description: Tensions run high between Clarke and Finn, and Raven discovers that Mount Weather is interfering with Camp Jaha's communication systems. Meanwhile, Jasper and Monty discover the truth about what's going on at Mount Weather.

title: Long Into an Abyss
description: As Abby and Jaha each try to establish their authority, Clarke comes up with a plan to stop the Grounders' attack. At Mount Weather, Jasper, Monty, Miller and Harper plan their escape, as Dr. Tsing and Cage conduct deadly experiments.

title: Spacewalker
description: Camp Jaha butt heads over what to do with Finn, as flashbacks show his and Raven's relationship on the Ark.

title: Remember Me
description: The alliance between Camp Jaha and the Grounders is jeopardized when Gustus is poisoned. Meanwhile at Mount Weather, Monty lands himself in hot water.

title: Survival of the Fittest
description: Clarke and Lexa encounter a new enemy. Bellamy and Lincoln work together to break into Mount Weather. Murphy helps Jaha confront his past. Indra makes Octavia an offer she can't refuse.

title: Coup de Gr√¢ce
description: Bellamy receives help from an unlikely source after being captured. Meanwhile, Abby fights to stay in control, and Jasper confronts President Wallace.

title: Rubicon
description: Clarke is faced with a difficult choice and Raven helps Bellamy navigate Mount Weather as Dr. Tsing begins to harvest the 47, while Jaha and Murphy encounter a stranger on their journey to the City of Light.

title: Resurrection
description: Clarke begins to question Lexa's leadership decisions and Indra continues to push Octavia. Meanwhile, at Mount Weather, Jasper steps up into the role of leader, and Cage throws Maya into a life threatening situation.

title: Bodyguard of Lies
description: As Jaha and Murphy encounter a perilous obstacle on their journey, Raven and Wick try to figure out how to disable the acid fog, and Bellamy races against time as his cover is blown.

title: Blood Must Have Blood: Part 1
description: As the Grounder army prepare to attack Mount Weather, a desperate Cage turns to Dante for help, and Raven and Wick experience a major setback.

title: Blood Must Have Blood: Part 2
description: After being betrayed by Lexa, Clarke makes a final stand against Mount Weather, while Jaha shocks Murphy as they continue their journey to the City of Light.

title: Wanheda: Part 1
description: After leaving Camp Arkadia due to her inability to accept her actions, Clarke sets out on her own, dealing with her emotions while encountering new challenges. Camp Arkadia begins to see political turmoil as the hunger for power mounts.

title: Wanheda: Part 2
description: Bellamy and Kane put their lives on the line to rescue Clarke; Abby considers opening Mount Weather as a medical facility; Murphy schemes against Jaha.

title: Ye Who Enter Here
description: Now with Clarke in her possession, Lexa has the power to force Skikru to become one with the grounders. Kane and Abby journey to the Polis Summit, while the Ice Nation prepares to draw first blood against Skikru and the other grounder clans.

title: Watch the Thrones
description: Clarke discovers the mastermind behind a devious plan, while Kane struggles to keep the peace. Meanwhile, Jasper's grief drives him to reckless behavior.

title: Hakeldama
description: Pike's twisted crusade threatens Clarke's attempts for peace. Raven becomes a target, while Murphy tries to conspire against Jaha.

title: Bitter Harvest
description: Clarke struggles with her morality while Abby grows suspicious of Jaha's motives.

title: Thirteen
description: Anger and lust for vengeance and justice from the clans threatens Lexa's position. Murphy unveils new secrets about the identity of Polis. Meanwhile, a dangerous coup brews against Clarke and Lexa and their trust for each other is tested.

title: Terms and Conditions
description: Kane tries to stop Pike, but he learns that he is onto him. Kane realizes that for him to ensure peace in Arkadia, he'll have to go through drastic measures.

title: Stealing Fire
description: Bellamy tries to save Kane from Pike. Clarke and Murphy debate over what to do with Titus and the A.I. Bellamy confronts Octavia.

title: Fallen
description: Jaha employs a terrifying new method to convince Abby to join his cause, Kane is on a mission, and Bellamy is hit with a hard truth. Meanwhile, Monty finds himself in a precarious situation, and Jasper rushes to save one of his own.

title: Nevermore
description: Clarke and her friends try to save Raven from Alie's control. However, they realize that they will have to undergo dangerous procedures that may cost Raven's life.

title: Demons
description: Jaha returns to Polis, and Murphy has a surprise encounter. Meanwhile, Octavia uncovers a clue.

title: Join or Die
description: Clarke is on a mission that could change everything. Meanwhile Murphy gains insight that might prove useful in ensuring his survival. Lastly Kane reaches a breaking point.

title: Red Sky at Morning
description: Clarke, Bellamy, Octavia and Jasper hit a tragic roadblock. Meanwhile, Raven and Monty make an important discovery.

title: Perverse Instantiation: Part One
description: Clarke finds hope in a place she never expected. Alie's master plan begins to coalesce.

title: Perverse Instantiation: Part Two
description: In the second half of the two-part season finale, everyone prepares for a final showdown as they begin to face the reality of their tragic situation in the epic and mind-bending conclusion.

title: Echoes
description: Clarke and her friends struggle with how to proceed after the fate of the world is revealed.

title: Heavy Lies the Crown
description: The burden of leading weighs heavily upon Bellamy (Bob Morley) and Clarke (Eliza Taylor) when different challenges force them to determine who will live and die.

title: The Four Horsemen
description: Jaha leads Clarke and Bellamy on a road to possible salvation, while tensions rise in Arkadia and Polis.

title: A Lie Guarded
description: Clarke's decision on who gets to live causes tension in Arcadia. Jasper loses his sanity when the Black Rain falls. Bellamy and his friends face judgement for their crimes against the Ice Nation.

title: The Tinder Box
description: Clarke pleads with a former allied force to avoid a war and ensure her people's survival.

title: We Will Rise
description: Clarke and Roan are forced to work together when they are tasked to deliver a dangerous but crucial asset to Abby through enemy territories.

title: Gimme Shelter
description: Clarke's arrival on the island quickly takes a turn for the worse. Meanwhile, Bellamy tries to avoid further tragedy in Arkadia.

title: God Complex
description: Clarke and Abby question how far they're willing to go when they make a disappointing discovery; Jaha finds a lead to the Second Dawn.

title: DNR
description: Clarke struggles to keep the peace after word of Jaha's discovery spreads.

title: Die All, Die Merrily
description: Octavia fights in the final battle for survival, but not everyone is willing to play fair.

title: The Other Side
description: Clarke faces the consequences of her fateful choice.

title: The Chosen
description: Jaha and Kane disagree over how to handle their grim reality. Meanwhile, Clarke leads a group to save a friend.

title: Praimfaya
description: It's a race against the end of the world as Praimfaya arrives forcing our heroes to make impossible decisions to ensure their survival.

title: Eden
description: Clarke struggles to survive on a desolate, scorched earth while her friends in space come across a long awaited beacon of hope.

title: Red Queen
description: Octavia is forced to take guidance from an unlikely ally when the future of the bunker and all those inside it is jeopardized.

title: Sleeping Giants
description: Bellamy leads the charge investigating a potential way home. Meanwhile, Clarke and Madi deal with the new, uncertain threat to their home.

title: Pandora's Box
description: Our heroes are forced to rely on the help of Shallow Valley's dangerous new inhabitants in order to save some of their own, with surprising results.

title: Shifting Sands
description: Octavia leads her people towards Shadow Valley against the advice of Clarke and Bellamy; Kane and Abby adjust to a new set of challenges.

title: Exit Wounds
description: Kane's attempt to prove himself useful tests Wonkru's allegiance to Octavia. Madi faces an unexpected threat inside Wonkru, forcing Clarke to make an unlikely ally.

title: Acceptable Losses
description: Clarke and Bellamy make a startling discovery about Wonkru's battle plans as Echo risks her friendship with Raven to complete her mission.

title: How We Get to Peace
description: Clarke's determination to protect Madi puts Bellamy in an impossible position.

title: Sic Semper Tyrannis
description: The growing fractures in Wonkru threaten to explode once and for all. Meanwhile, in Shadow Valley, Murphy starts a fire, unleashing catastrophic results.

title: The Warriors Will
description: Monty strives to show Wonkru an alternative to war, and to the valley itself. Meanwhile, Abby's health continues to deteriorate, along with McCreary's patience.

title: The Dark Year
description: As Clarke races to save Abby, she learns more about the trials and tribulations Wonkru faced in the bunker, and the impossible decisions they were forced to make in the dark year.

title: Damocles: Part 1
description: In part one of the fifth season finale, Octavia leads her people into war. While behind enemy lines, our heroes must overcome their differences to save Wonkru from extinction.

title: Damocles: Part 2
description: Clarke and her friends must risk everything to fight one last battle for survival, only to glimpse an even darker threat to the last living valley on earth.
